control.name: KoolListBox - Advanced PHP ListBox
control.metadescription: KoolListBox is advanced control that extends the standard html listbox to the max. It supports order item, transfer item to another listbox, drag-and-drop and many more..
control.metakeywords: listbox, php listbox, ajax listbox, web20 listbox, multi select listbox
control.description: KoolListBox is advanced control that extends the standard html listbox to the max. It supports order item, transfer item to another listbox, drag-and-drop and many more..
